patterns.loopArchitecture: /flow for end-to-end, /do for step-by-step, /orchestrate for multi-agent
patterns.effortControls: Per-phase effort annotations (low/high/max) in command docs - advisory, backward-compatible
patterns.agentSpawning: Agent Teams preferred, Task tool fallback
patterns.versionBumping: Update ALL version references: plugin.json, .plugin-version, hook comments, README, setup.sh, claude-progress.json
